Restricted quantifier version of ~ exlimi .  (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)

 Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Restricted quantifier version.)  (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement:
rexlimi.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
rexlimi.2 $e |- ( x e. A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
rexlimi $p |- ( E. x e. A ph -> ps ) $.
